sentences.en: " The devil is a better theologian than any of us and is a devil still. "
sentences.cn: 魔鬼的神学造诣比我们每一位都要高,可他仍然是抵挡神的.

sentences.en: Augustine of Hippo was the most influential theologian of Latin Christianity.
sentences.cn: 奥古斯丁是拉丁基督教神学最有影响.

sentences.en: Barrow: English theologian, scholar, and mathematician who wrote about trigonometry, optics, and papal supremacy.
sentences.cn: 巴罗: 英国神学家 、 学者和数学家,写有三角学 、 光学和神权方面的著作.

sentences.en: Ding Guangxun , a theologian, is the main speaker of Christians in China.
sentences.cn: 丁光训 是当代中国基督教的主要发言人和神学家.

sentences.en: Dutch Renaissance scholar and Roman Catholic theologian who attacked the theology of Martin Luther ( 1466 - 1536 ) .
sentences.cn: 攻击 马丁路德 的神学的荷兰文艺复兴人士和罗马天主教的神学者.

sentences.en: Forget the fire and brimstone: his subtle eloquence made him the country's most influential theologian.
sentences.cn: 忘记火硫磺: 他的口才,使他微妙我国最有影响的神学家.

sentences.en: French - born Swiss theologian whose tenets defined Presbyterianism ( 1509 - 1564 ).
sentences.cn: 用自己的原则定义长老派主义的法籍瑞士人.

sentences.en: German theologian who founded the Moravian Church ( 1722 ).
sentences.cn: 亲岑道夫,尼古拉斯·路德维希·冯1700-1760德国神学家,他创立了摩拉维亚教会 ( 1722年 )
